Deficiency Narrative: Staff files were not available at the time of the inspection.
Correction Narrative: The operations will ensure the key is always available by putting the key in a lock box in the living room area so all staff can provide the records. The operation will also make sure all staff know where to locate all files required at the time of the inspection.
